text: The women's 400 metres event at the 1979 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 24 and 25 February in Vienna.ResultsResults (p. 477) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Verona Elder '''' |Jarmila Kratochvílová '''' |Karoline Käfer '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 from each heat (Q) qualified directly for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
